None.Name: Mass Epidemic
None.Description: Infects up to 5 hostile or friendly units with a parasite that deals 100 damage every second. After 4 seconds the parasites pass over to the next available targets within a 25m range. Every parasite may affect a total of 4 hostile or friendly targets. Parasites will vanish if no more targets are nearby. Reusable every 30 seconds.
